description: cyclo- +‎ Ancient Greek στροφή (strophḗ, “a turn, bend, twist”) +‎ -ic

adjectives.description: cyclostrophic (comparative more cyclostrophic, superlative most cyclostrophic)

entries.meaning: (meteorology) Relating to the balance, in the atmosphere, between the opposing effects of the horizontal pressure gradient and the centrifugal force on a rotating air mass.
